title: Expose Customer_Analyzer synced fit/segment/positioning data to guidance generation context

sections.text: Add a retrieval layer (service method/API + caching as needed) that surfaces the Customer_Analyzer integration table data (fit score, segment, approved positioning blocks) to the initiation and follow-up guidance generator for a given CRM account/opportunity. Ensure correct ID mapping (account vs opportunity), deterministic selection of the latest synced version, and safe fallbacks when data is missing or stale. This ticket focuses on data access and wiring only (no prompt/content changes).
